Class BitreDataDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.dao.BitreDataDao

  • @Repository
public class BitreDataDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for the BITRE (Ports Australia) data
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost

      • find

        public BitreData find(java.lang.Integer id)
               throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve an BitreData in the CSS Database from it's unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required BitreData
        Returns:
        the BitreData object corresponding to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • find

        @Transactional
public BitreData find(Seaport seaport,
                           BitreVariable variable)
               throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve all the BITRE data in a given seaport for a given variable
        Parameters:
        seaport: - the seaport to retrieve data from
        variable: - the BITRE variable for which the data should be retrieved
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if no BitrrData matches the given seaport

      • find

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<BitreData> find(Seaport seaport,
                                           BitreVariableCategory category)
                               throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve all the BITRE data in a given seaport for a given category of variables
        Parameters:
        seaport: - the seaport to retrieve data from
        category: - the category of BITRE variable for which the data should be retrieved
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if no BitreData matches the given seaport
